ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gordon on summoned water breathing stones
ygData.msgSnippet: Gordon really has no idea how wrong he is.  People don t care that they can get infinite EB forever, they care that they can get FREE EB for the trip that
ygData.messageBody:
Gordon really has no idea how wrong he is. People
don't care that they can get infinite EB forever, they
care that they can get FREE EB for the trip that
they're going on. I'm lucky if I can sell Aqualungs
anymore, and the last rebreather that I made is being
passed around to guildmates who need it while I'm
playing in the planes.

With the addition of magician summoned stones, this
market has gone to the crappers. And now they took
away the lore tag as well. Talk about adding insult
to injury =( There's nothing that I can make and sell
to people which raises my skill anymore, so I'm not
going to bother sinking any more money into it until
they revamp the trade.

/rude Verant dev team

Gazamel Prime
50 Gnome Warrior
Master Tinker of 123 Aqualungs
Solusek Ro

--- Tony Buser <gr0k@...> wrote:
> Is the list still alive? Haven't seen a post in
> quite a while. :)
>
> Just thought I'd pass on a quote from Gordon. I can
> see his point, but I
> don't quite agree with it. Tho I'm no where near
> the tinkering level to
> make them, I can invision a situation like this:
>
> A poor Gnome who's spent months and several thousand
> plat, worked hard and
> spent an insane amount of time and effort to master
> tinkering walks into
> the zone outside Kedge and shouts "Rebreather for
> sale 2k pp"
>
> Any mage walks in the zone outside Kedge and shouts
> "a bunch of
> breathing stones for sale 20pp"
>
> How many tells do you think the gnome will get? :(
>
> Q: This latest patch just made the mages 1-charge
> water breathing stones
> non-lore. I already had a heck of a time selling my
> aqualungs/rebreathers.
> Now any 50 lev can walk into unrest and offer 20pp
> for a backpack full of
> stones to any 20th level mage.
>
> A: This really shouldn't be a problem. Sure, they
> might be non-lore, but
> they are summoned so they will disappear on log out
> or on a lost
> connection. Something that does unlimited enduring
> breath is superior to
> the stones. -Gordon
>
> ---
> gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land -
> http://www.juju.org
> Ubershadow Leprechaun - Level 35 Gnome Rogue -
> http://tunares.juju.org
>
>
>
